message: What's up folks?
Hey Patrick. Sounds like some exciting things are going down at Eldarion. You liking the new gig?
how's it going
Hey Josh, yes, I'm having a ton of fun.  Love working on open source stuff as part of the job.
I will not be there. Most likely be going to CodeConf instead.
But that's an idea. Take her with you. Should be a nice time to be in San Fran
It's sad to sign on and notice that I'm the only one online in this group.
i would love to go to codeconf, but we had already talked/decided to go to pycon when I found out about it.
so who all is going to pycon this year?
You're 2 grand in the hole pretty quick.
yeah, i don't think I can justify that to my wife. Especially if she's not going.
hahaha
i thought about it, it is close to our anniversary. However, she would not like it if I was not around for 2 days.
That's tough.
We have 4 folks from Emma going, but not sure who just yet.
I'm not certain it's going to happen but Kevin and I will probably be there.
i'm half tempted to just pay for it out of pocket.
Yeah, it could get expensive. $500 just for the pass, airfare, and hotel. Eek.
I'm fumbling through some ruby code right now. I feel like a drunk navigating a maze.
I can read it, but I have no conception of where to turn next.
yeah, i just looked at that. About 300 for the flight, 675 for the hotel, that starts to add up real quick.
That would be cool. I've really fallen in love with it.
I've done two pretty large prototyping things with it over the last few weeks.
there are a couple of things I would love to add, like a non decorator approach to urls, but i do like it a lot.
I've also had to do some dancing to use the app factory pattern and keep some stuff from getting complicated.
yeah, it get's messy. I might try and add a patch for a more django like urls pattern.
well, at least it looks like i'll get to go to pycon this year.
yeah. There are some cool looking topics this. I'm looking forward to the flask talk by Armin
i also would love to see nexus running on flask.
That URL thing is definitely a bear as things get bigger.
That's cool.
It's always a good time.
